title: How to access the Internet without Internet access - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a number of tools that use SMS to pull information from the internet, but they are mostly available in countries with poor data infrastructure. For example, in Africa you can send and receive Gmail on your phone as SMS You can also see other SMS applications at Google, though some have been discontinued. There are some SMS Search Services, but Google and Yahoo have seemed to stop theirs. A Google search gateway for SMS has appeared at SMIR.CH. Facebook via SMS: Facebook Texts | Facebook Help Center | Facebook Twitter via SMS : Twitter via SMS FAQs
You can’t. The question contradicts itself. Either you have Internet access, or you don’t. Think of Schrödinger's cat - Wikipedia.
